pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OARepo communities## InstallationTo init custom fields, add them under COMMUNITIES_CUSTOM_FIELDS key to invenio.cfg, for example``` pythonfrom oarepo_communities.cf.permissions import PermissionsCFfrom oarepo_communities.cf.aai import AAIMappingCFCOMMUNITIES_CUSTOM_FIELDS = [PermissionsCF("permissions"), AAIMappingCF("aai")]COMMUNITIES_CUSTOM_FIELDS_UI = [{ "section": "settings", "fields": [{ "field": "permissions", "ui_widget": "Input", "props": { "label":"permissions dict", } }] }]```and the init cli command:invenio communities custom-fields init
